p: Finely ground MOB powder was extracted with 50% ethanol at 60 Â°C for 2 h. The ratio of bark powder to ethanol was 1:8 ( w/ v). Filtration steps were performed as described earlier for SBR extraction. The extracted solution was then treated with hexane for 30 min. The solvent was removed through evaporation and desiccated storage. Stock solution was prepared according to the methods explained earlier.
